member.name: T:ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Common.Result`1
member.summary: Represents a result that can be either a success or failure. Implements Railway Oriented Programming pattern for error handling.
member.typeparam: The type of the success value.

member.name: P:ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Common.Result`1.IsSuccess
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the result is successful.

member.name: P:ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Common.Result`1.Value
member.summary: Gets the success value if the result is successful.

member.name: P:ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Common.Result`1.Error
member.summary: Gets the error message if the result is a failure.

member.name: M:ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Common.Result`1.#ctor(`0,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Common.Result`1.Success(`0)
member.summary: Creates a successful result.
member.returns: A successful result.

member.name: M:ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Common.Result`1.Failure(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a failure result.
member.returns: A failure result.

member.name: M:ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Common.Result`1.op_Implicit(`0)~ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Common.Result{`0}
member.summary: Implicitly converts a value to a successful result.

member.name: T:ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Common.ResultExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for Result<T> to enable fluent Railway Oriented Programming operations.

member.name: M:ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Common.ResultExtensions.Bind``2(ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Common.Result{``0},System.Func{``0,System.Threading.Tasks.Task{ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Common.Result{``1}}})
member.summary: Binds a function to a result, continuing the railway if successful.
member.returns: A new result.

member.name: M:ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Common.ResultExtensions.Bind``2(ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Common.Result{``0},System.Func{``0,ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Common.Result{``1}})
member.summary: Binds a synchronous function to a result, continuing the railway if successful.
member.returns: A new result.

member.name: M:ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Common.ResultExtensions.Map``2(ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Common.Result{``0},System.Func{``0,``1})
member.summary: Maps a function over a successful result.
member.returns: A new result.

member.name: M:ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Common.ResultExtensions.MapAsync``2(ExxerCube.Prisma.Domain.Common.Result{``0},System.Func{``0,System.Threading.Tasks.Task{``1}})
member.summary: Maps an async function over a successful result.
member.returns: A new result.

member.summary: Executes an action on a successful result, returning the same result.
member.returns: The same result.

member.summary: Executes an async action on a successful result, returning the same result.
member.returns: The same result.
